## toBoolean() function

Converts value to it's boolean representation (x != 0)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function toBoolean(value: number | string | BigNumberType | boolean): boolean;
```

|  value | number \| string \| BigNumberType \| boolean |  |
